IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.delete_mail_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.delete_mail_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.delete_mail_item @mail_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE dbo.Mails SET game_money = 0 WHERE id = @mail_id
DELETE FROM dbo.Mail_Equip_Item_Infos WHERE mail_id = @mail_id DELETE FROM dbo.Mail_Inventories WHERE mail_id = @mail_id
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
